about_the_game:
Underground: World War is a fighting game inspired by the Def Jam series. You can create your own fighter or play as some of your favorite rappers in this over the top fighting game. Fighters can be fully customized and choose multiple fighting styles.

Go head-to-head in *1 vs 1* matches for a test of skill and strategy, team up for thrilling *2 vs 2* battles, or unleash chaos in *Free for All* fights where anything goes. Whether you prefer solo showdowns or chaotic multiplayer action, there’s a mode for every fighter. Step into the arena and prove your dominance!

WINNING

Winning requires a knock out or submission. Each fighting style has unique knockout methods: streetfighters with strong punches, wrestlers with strong grapples, kickboxers with kick-combos, martial artists with flying attacks and submission experts can force the enemy to submit with grapples.

ARENA IMPACT

Use environments and crowds for damage. Toss opponents into barriers and slam them into walls or gates. Crowds will push fighters back into combat or hold them, leaving them open to attacks. Some spectators will offer weapons, and some might attack!

RAGE!

RAGE is gained by performing moves, countering, and taunting, influenced by the fighters' statistics, which varies between fighters. Created fighters can boost their statistics by upgrading skillset or wardrobe. A full RAGE meter allows enabling a powerful RAGE move.

CREATE YOUR FIGHTER

Customize every detail of your fighter, from facial features and body shape to a full wardrobe of unique gear. Build a look that suits your style and step into the fight with a character that's truly your own!

FIGHTING STYLES

After creating your fighter, it's time to pick your fighting style. Each fighting style comes with its own unique strengths, combos, and finishing moves. Your choice defines how you fight, so pick wisely and prepare to conquer your enemies!

VENUES

Fight your way through the Underground Parking, where the environment is your weapon! Smash opponents into cars, slam them against pillars, and use the thundering speakers for devastating attacks. The crowd is wild, and some even bring weapons into the chaos.

Battle deep in the Urban Underground, a dangerous subway arena where the environment can be your deadliest weapon! Slam opponents into pillars, walls, and fences, or send them crashing onto the train tracks. Time it right, and the incoming train will deliver an instant KO!

  • Visit our website for a complete overview of venues to battle in. More venues will be added over time.

ROSTER

Reveal soon
